messages.en: Urgh!

messages.zh: 你，你这个碍事的混蛋小子！
messages.en: You, you’re in the way bastard!

messages.zh: 都、都头破血流成这样了，还敢在这挡我们的好事——！
messages.en: You are already wounded! You still dare to stop us from--!

messages.zh: 区区这点伤，连日常训练都算不上！
messages.en: A little wound like this can’t even match up to my routine training!
Argh--
How many of them are left?

messages.zh: 算了，记不清了，反正已经全都挡住——
messages.en: Nevermind, I can’t recall all their numbers. What matters is that I stopped them all anyway---
A-an earthquake?

messages.zh: 欸？那边的山岩怎么崩塌了？
messages.en: Huh? How did that section of rock over there collapsed?

messages.zh: 骗人的吧？她居然打破了那么厚的石壁？
messages.en: Are you kidding me? She broke through such a thick wall of rock?

messages.zh: 入口被打开了一条新的路！赶紧进去！
messages.en: There’s a new path opened! Get in there!

messages.zh: 糟了，那些人一定会从斯卡蒂打出的通道涌进来！
messages.en: Oh, no, those people must be flooding in through the hole that Skadi made!
Got to go help--
Stop where you are.
Skadi——

messages.zh: 居然能直接破坏山体，强行穿过去，罗德岛的异闻果然是真的啊。
messages.en: You truly can destroy a mountain and force your way through. So the stories from Rhodes Island were true.
Where is the girl?
I can’t tell you.

messages.zh: 盯上那东西的人不止我一个。
messages.en: I'm not the only one after that thing.

messages.zh: 难道我非要把你好好教训一顿，你才不会碍事？
messages.en: Must I first teach you a lesson so that you won’t get in the way?

messages.zh: 你突然就要带走可萝尔，我怎么也不能轻易把她交给你啊！
messages.en: You’re the one who all of a sudden wants to take Carol away. I couldn’t exactly just give her to you that easily!

messages.zh: 你要......阻碍罗德岛的任务？
messages.en: Are you intending to... hinder my mission?

messages.zh: 你也没告诉我罗德岛给你分配了什么任务啊！
messages.en: You didn't even told me what kind of mission you were assigned to!
Unless you were...
Don’t suddenly attack your fellow partner!
I have never said I was your partner.

messages.zh: 我最后一次问，带我去见那个女孩。
messages.en: I will ask one last time, where is the girl?

messages.zh: 只要她还是我的委托人，我就绝不会这么做。
messages.en: As long as she is my client, I'll never say anything to you.
Urgh!

messages.zh: 可恶，她只是用剑随手碰了下我的枪而已啊，可我的胳膊好像要断了......
messages.en: Damn, I can feel my arms almost break just from one hit of her sword.

messages.zh: 只凭你这种能力，你真的认为自己保护得了她？
messages.en: Did you really think you can protect her with your strength alone?

messages.zh: 能不能做到，和去不去做是两回事！
messages.en: Whether I could do it, and whether I just do it are two different things!
Huh? Wait a second!
Look out!
Hmph. That should be a hit.

messages.zh: 好像有，不对，好像没有！那家伙还好好的！
messages.en: I think so. Wait no it’s not! That woman is still fine!
...Again?
Ergh!

messages.zh: 灾、灾星！把上尉打伤的，就是你吧！你今天就别想从这里——
messages.en: W-walking disaster! You will pay for attacking the captain! Don’t think you will pass through here today--
Now is a good opportunity!
You can’t pass either!

messages.zh: 你们还是想想办法先拦住她吧！
messages.en: You should be thinking now of how to stop her!
——What?

messages.zh: 什么情况？！那个小个子，从我们头上跳过去了？
messages.en: What's going on? ! That little guy jumped over our heads?
Skadi, I'm leaving first!
You...

messages.zh: 不好意思！等你想清楚，准备告诉我事实了，我再考虑可萝尔的事！
messages.en: I’m sorry! When you finally figured it out and ready to tell me the truth, I'll think about your request on Carol!
Stop! Where are you going!
I'm really sorry!
Why did you just let her go!

messages.zh: 她跑得太快了，我们追不上她啊！
messages.en: She ran so fast that we couldn’t catch up to her!

messages.zh: 没事，这不是还有一个吗。
messages.en: It's okay. There's another one here.

messages.zh: 你个子那么大，不可能也跳过去吧？
messages.en: You're too big to jump over us. Right?
You are all done for.

messages.zh: 岔路好多啊。这里就是可萝尔所说的墓穴了吧。
messages.en: So many branching paths. I guess this is the tomb that Carol spoke about.
A bounty hunter——
*Groan*.... Help me...
What a poor bounty hunter.

messages.zh: 就像是被罗德岛号来回碾压过好几遍......
messages.en: It seems like he was run over by Rhodes Island (Rhodes Island is a land vehicle moving base) several times.

messages.zh: 可、可斯卡蒂不是还没进来吗？
messages.en: But Skadi hasn't been here before?

messages.zh: 这个看上去像炸开的洞是？
messages.en: This looks like a blast hole?
Then that means————
It seems you made your choice.
What part of my acting stood out?
I knew it, it was you————
